response:
The house was bought for $80,000 and repaired for $50,000, so total investment = $80,000 + $50,000 = $130,000.  
A 150 % increase of the original value (80,000) gives a new value of  
\(80,000 \times (1 + 1.5) = 80,000 \times 2.5 = 200,000\).  

Profit = final value – investment = $200,000 – $130,000 = $70,000.  

#### 70000
